answers.answer: Good luck. I failed the one hour and passed the three hour. A lot of people fail the first Don't worry :) I think I failed because the morning I took it my breakfast was pop tarts so I think the drink on top of that made me reflect the false positive.
Waoh, i also ate in the morning that day. Today I fast from 12 midnight.
I failed my 1hr but passed my 3 hr i hated it the red drink was nasty i had to get stuck 4 times ughhh good luck
Walk around during the 3hour one. It helps bring down the level
I wouldn't really worry.  I failed my 1hr glucose test and passed my 3hr glucose test.  Good luck!
Aren't you supposed to stay still for exactly the reason of moving changing the test results??? :s
I failed. Its not so bad and gd goes away after birth. If anything its made me eat better and feel better and not gain so much weight. But yes walk around it will help burn the sugars down.
Not to mention if you have it you get to meet your baby sooner lol. I get induced in 15 daysbebecause I have it. Only thing that it does to the baby is make him /her bigger
Waoh, thank you all, apparently my baby is of size so far. I will be in 3rd trimester next week.  Wishing the best.
My baby is measuring at 6lbs 8 oz

question: Please ladies give me some hope that it will be negative. No one in our entire generation had diabetes. I am of weight too and I still believe the test is conducted on a wrong procedure.
title: Scheduled for my 3hr GT
